abilities.name: Natural Cure
abilities.effect: Whenever you attach an Energy card from your hand to this Pokémon, it recovers from all Special Conditions.

attacks.name: Blissful Blast
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 more damage for each Energy attached to this Pokémon. If you did any damage with this attack, you may attach up to 3 Energy cards from your discard pile to this Pokémon.
